75.heading: Adventures into Weird Worlds, no. 16.
75.title: "Kiss of Death" 6 p. in Journey into Mystery, no. 12
75.author: [No author]
75.series: Aug. 1974) ; reprinted from Adventures into Weird Worlds, no. 16
notes: SUMMARY: In an old house in the Catskills, a greedy wife tries to scare her weak-hearted, well-insured husband to death by dressing as a vampire; it doesn't work, but a real vampire comes along, bites and rejuvenates him.

Cover title in reprint: The Kiss of the Undead. I. The Kiss of the Undead. k. Death. k. Vampires. k. Catskills. k. Greed. k. Weak Hearts. k. Heart Disease. k. Insurance. k. Rejuvenation. k. Undead. Call no.: PN6728.4.M3J7no.12
